Text.Page:
It's almost impossible to get inside this fortress without being seen.

But that means there some tricks we must use in this place."What do you mean?"

I mean getting rid of those draakons. The draakons are proud and arrogant. Even though they're attacked, they won't call for any reinforcements outside the fortress.

Defeat them and go to the engine room. Their backup is going to be slower than you think."What should I do?"
We shouldn't run into any trouble if we act step by step. First, take care of the Ravagers over there.
Good job. Hang on. I'll tell you what to do next.
